messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Carol.....
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Brynn, We live just south of the golf course, actually 2 blocks south of Grove Street!  This is too cool!  At the moment, I have a 9 1/2 year-old son, but
messages.messageBody:
Dear Brynn,
We live just south of the golf course, actually 2 blocks south of Grove
Street! This is too cool! At the moment, I have a 9 1/2 year-old son, but
we will soon be licensed for foster care and we plan to adopt two more
children. I am new to unschooling, but I am finding it a fascinating
lifestyle. I am a member of the Marysville Support Group, but I don't attend
very regularly. We will have to get together and share ideas!

Carol
